name: Save Their Souls (itch)
description:
Arrow keys/WASD to move and jump.

The grim reaper can double-jump with variable jump height.

STS uses the same scripts as Easy Game (playable here; https://thomasbradstreet.itch.io/easy-game) but with an updated theme. Upon death you'll be sent back to the previous room. The ceiling, walls, and floor will kill you, so make sure when you get sent back a room you don't walk straight into another hazard! 

I made this game on my course at City College Brighton roughly 5 years ago, and it was my first experiment with making a 2D game look stylised.
